column1: Mauhúr was an Orcs in the service of Saruman.
Mauhúr was sent to reinforce Uglúks troop as they returned to Isengard with Meriadoc Brandybuck and Peregrin Took. He found them surrounded by Éomers Rohirrim at the edge of Fangorn Forest
column2: from which he led his Orcs in an attack. This attack was a failure: the Rohirrim were able to defeat the Orcs
column3: even with Mauhúrs reinforcements. Though Mauhúrs own fate is not known with certainty
column4: it seems that he fell with his soldiers at the hands of the Rohirrim.

column1: File:The Lord of the Rings - The Two Towers - Mauhúr.jpg
:Mauhúr can be played as Unique Leader
column2: and his home site is Dol Guldur.

column1: 2002: The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers:
:Mauhúr is portrayed as an Uruk-hai instead of an Orc
column2: and is played by Robbie Magasiva and voice Andy Serkis. He was the commander after Lurtzs death.
